name: vk_cl_invoice
description: This table stores information related to invoices, including billing details, payment terms, and related financial data.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the invoice process was executed.

columns.name: contract_no
columns.description: The unique identifier for the contract associated with the invoice.

columns.name: event
columns.description: The type of event or transaction related to the invoice.

columns.name: posting_account_address
columns.description: The address associated with the account where the invoice is posted.

columns.name: invoice_type
columns.description: The category or type of the invoice.

columns.name: invoice_no
columns.description: The unique identifier for the invoice.

columns.name: bill_ccy
columns.description: The currency in which the invoice is billed.

columns.name: billed_amt
columns.description: The total amount billed in the invoice.

columns.name: bill_narrative
columns.description: Additional narrative or notes related to the billing.

columns.name: bill_user_id
columns.description: The identifier for the user responsible for the billing.

columns.name: acct_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account related to the invoice.

columns.name: value_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp indicating when the value was recorded.

columns.name: posting_instructions_id
columns.description: The identifier for the posting instructions related to the invoice.

columns.name: bill_date
columns.description: The date when the invoice was issued.

columns.name: due_date
columns.description: The date by which the invoice payment is due.

columns.name: grace_period_date
columns.description: The date until which payment can be made without penalty.

columns.name: interest_rate
columns.description: The interest rate applicable to the invoice.

columns.name: late_payment_charges_on_overdue_interest_rate
columns.description: The rate of charges applied on overdue interest.

columns.name: since
columns.description: The date from which the invoice terms are effective.

columns.name: late_payment_charges_on_overdue_interest_amount
columns.description: The amount charged for late payment on overdue interest.

columns.name: sweep_amount
columns.description: The amount swept from the account related to the invoice.

columns.name: from_due_datetime
columns.description: The starting date and time for the due period.

columns.name: to_due_datetime
columns.description: The ending date and time for the due period.

columns.name: int_rate
columns.description: The interest rate applicable to the invoice.

columns.name: int_to
columns.description: The date until which interest is calculated.

columns.name: int_from
columns.description: The date from which interest is calculated.

columns.name: dd_no
columns.description: The number of the demand draft related to the invoice.

columns.name: loan_no
columns.description: The unique identifier for the loan associated with the invoice.

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: The start date of the loan related to the invoice.

columns.name: principal
columns.description: The principal amount of the loan related to the invoice.

columns.name: outstanding
columns.description: The outstanding balance on the invoice.

columns.name: dpd
columns.description: The number of days the payment is past due.

columns.name: final_settle_date
columns.description: The date when the invoice was fully settled.

columns.name: fully_settled
columns.description: Indicates whether the invoice has been fully settled.

columns.name: year
columns.description: The year in which the invoice was issued.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month in which the invoice was issued.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day of the month when the invoice was issued.
